    • Method Detail

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile()
        This method write the the list of the tasks into local file

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This method is to clear the database and the local file

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile()
        This method read from local file

      • add

        public boolean add(Task task)
        This method handles the writing into the text file with the add command. It returns true if the task is successfully written into the file.
        Parameters:
        Task - the task to be added
        Returns:
        TRUE whether the task is successfully added\
        Throws:
        IOException - when task already exist

      • delete

        public boolean delete(Task taskToDelete)
        This method handles the updating of text file when the specified task is to be deleted. Returns true if the task is successfully deleted.
        Parameters:
        Task - the task to be deleted
        Returns:
        boolean true if the task is successfully deleted; false if the task to delete does not exist

      • checkExistence

        public boolean checkExistence(Task taskToCheck)
        This method returns whether a task is in the text file.
        Parameters:
        Task - task to search
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if the task is found; false if not.

      • retrieveAll

        public ArrayList<Task> retrieveAll()
        This method returns all the tasks in the database.
        Returns:
        an arraylist of all the tasks in database

      • recover

        public Boolean recover(ArrayList<Task> backup)

      • retrieve

        public ArrayList<Task> retrieve(SearchCommand command)
        This method search for and then return tasks from the database according to the command.
        Parameters:
        command - command to search for the tasks in the database
        Returns:
        an arraylist of all the tasks in the search result; if the search result is empty, returns an empty arraylist

      • smartSearch

        public ArrayList<Task> smartSearch(String[] keywords)
        search for tasks whose names containing the passed in string as a substring
        Parameters:
        keywords - array of keywords to search for
        Returns:
        resultList arraylist list of result tasks

      • setNewFile

        public boolean setNewFile(String newFilePath)
        This method is to set new file for the storage of data.
        Parameters:
        newFile - the string that contains the new path and file name
        Returns:
        boolean return true if the directory exists and the new file is set.

      • openNewFile

        public boolean openNewFile(String newFilePath)
        This method opens a new file for task storage in another directory
        Parameters:
        newFilePath - the new directory to open the new file or create a new file to store the tasks
        Returns:
        boolean true if the a new file is created in the new directory;

      • getPath

        public String getPath()
        This method returns the path of the local text file that stores all the tasks.
        Returns:
        a string that represents the path

      • sort

        public void sort(String fieldName,
                 String order)
        Sort the tasks in the text file in the specific order of the specific field.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the field to sort on
        order - the order of the task list after sorting, either in ascending order or descending order
